actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Select Committee on Indian Affairs (without written rept.).
Referred to Senate Committee on the Budget.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on the Budget, S. Rept. 95-1408.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A Resolution waiving section 402 (a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to consideration of S.857, a bill to amend the Act of September 30, 1950 (Public Law 874, Eighty-first Congress) to provide education programs for Native Hawaiians, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Waives certain requirements of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S. 857 (Education programs for Native Hawaiians).

titles.title: A Resolution waiving section 402 (a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to consideration of S.857, a bill to amend the Act of September 30, 1950 (Public Law 874, Eighty-first Congress) to provide education programs for Native Hawaiians, and for other purposes.
